alert.note: Alert for Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:17PM EDT until June 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HERTFORD AND CENTRAL GATES COUNTIES... At 717 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gatesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Gatesville around 720 PM EDT. Sunbury around 735 PM EDT. Hobbsville around 740 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Eure, Easons Crossroads, Acorn Hill, Rays Beach, Buckland, Sandy Cross, Carter and Trotville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
